oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Grazing management for Nordic organic dairy farming
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kuusela, Eeva
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Feeding and growth
Composting and manuring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aims of this study were to identify limiting factors and to develop adjusted grazing management for Nordic organic dairy farming conditions. The focus was to combine the aspects of plant, animal and organic production, as they are all involved in organic dairy pastures.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kuusela, Eeva (2005) Grazing management for Nordic organic dairy farming. In: NJF Report, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 1 (1), pp. 143-146.
